feed.title: Streamystats Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: streamystat: v1.7.3
entry.content:
1.7.3 (2025-05-21)

Bug Fixes

  • incorrect transcoding logo (78f3a21)
  • incorrect transcoding logo when imported data from plugin (4ddc567)
  • refactor dashboard (fd5b55a)
  • refactor settings page and sidebar (ef1d080)
  • refactor settings page and sidebar (8b3a141)

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v1.7.5
entry.content:
1.7.5 (2025-05-21)

Bug Fixes

  • incorrect transcoding logo when imported data from plugin (4ddc567)
  • use correct DirectPlay when importing data (3781f1c)
  • zombie process (9d262de)
  • zombie process (98548f6)

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: streamystat: v1.8.0
entry.content:
1.8.0 (2025-05-24)

Features

  • add based on statistic (1264e4f)
  • add User Activity chart with date filtering (e99da45)
  • add User Activity chart with date filtering - Add horizontal bar chart showing daily active users - Implement user activity statistics in Phoenix backend - Add new API endpoint for user activity data - Create date filtering with calendar component - Add client-side data fetching via API route - Chart displays unique users per day from playback_sessions - Include date range controls with preset options - Fix tooltip spacing and layout issues (0874dc5)
  • enhance active sessions with detailed bitrate and transcoding info (410fe01)
  • enhance active sessions with detailed bitrate and transcoding info (9cb525d)
  • ollama support for embedding (d3ad198)
  • ollama support for embeddings (cbba66d)
  • preferred server (b4a3b8b)
  • watchtime per week day (bd6ef2a)

Bug Fixes

  • better ai recommendations (47f3b06)
  • design (446c790)
  • poster quality (f79b7c1)
  • small issues (abb58ba)
  • type error (fb3048d)
  • use Jellyfin UUID instead of ID as primary key (13afb2a)
  • width (201f365)

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v1.8.0
entry.content:
1.8.0 (2025-05-24)

Features

  • add based on statistic (1264e4f)
  • add User Activity chart with date filtering (e99da45)
  • add User Activity chart with date filtering - Add horizontal bar chart showing daily active users - Implement user activity statistics in Phoenix backend - Add new API endpoint for user activity data - Create date filtering with calendar component - Add client-side data fetching via API route - Chart displays unique users per day from playback_sessions - Include date range controls with preset options - Fix tooltip spacing and layout issues (0874dc5)
  • ollama support for embedding (d3ad198)
  • ollama support for embeddings (cbba66d)
  • watchtime per week day (bd6ef2a)

Bug Fixes

  • better ai recommendations (47f3b06)
  • hide items (191bdab)
  • improve sync (519217c)
  • migrate to jellyfin uuid instead of custom id (74e7803)
  • migrate to jellyfin uuid instead of custom id (1c454f4)
  • small issues (abb58ba)
  • sync (6fd93d6)
  • use Jellyfin UUID instead of ID as primary key (13afb2a)

entry.title: New release for Streamystats: v2.0.0
entry.content:
2.0.0 (2025-06-07)

⚠️ BREAKING CHANGE: v1 → v2 Migration Required

🛑 This is a major breaking change upgrade from v1 to v2. The entire stack has changed including Docker images, Docker compose file and database architecture.

Docker Image Changes: - ❌ Discontinued: streamystats:edge - ✅ New: streamystats-v2-*:latest

🚀 What's New

⚠️ MANDATORY for ALL v1 Users

1. Backup Your Current v1 Data:

1.1 Dump database

bash docker exec -t streamystats_db pg_dumpall -c -U postgres > backup.sql

1.2 Export .db file from Streamystats settings

2. Convert Export to JSON (for import): ```bash

Convert your .db file (exported from settings) to JSON format

sqlite3 input.db -json "SELECT * FROM playback_sessions;" > exported_data.json ```

3. Complete Fresh v2 Setup: ```bash

IMPORTANT: Remove old data volumes completely

docker compose down -v

Get the new v2 docker-compose.yml

curl -o docker-compose.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/docker-compose.yml

Start fresh v2 setup

docker compose up -d ```

4. Import Your Data: - Navigate to StreamyStats v2 → Settings → Legacy Import - Upload your exported JSON file - Follow the import wizard

📦 Fresh Installation & Upgrade Instructions

Docker Installation (Recommended)

```bash

Get the new v2 docker-compose.yml

curl -o docker-compose.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fredrikburmester/streamystats/{{tag}}/docker-compose.yml docker-compose up -d ```
